title: Fico’s coalition clashes over Slovakia’s pro-Ukraine UN vote
summary: A row over Slovakia's UN vote on Russia's war in Ukraine has exposed another split within Prime Minister Fico's ruling coalition, with officials publicly disputing the country's stance.
